debates.showAs: Employment Equality (Abolition of Mandatory Retirement Age) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Employment Equality Act 1998 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Employment Equality (Abolition of Mandatory Retirement Age) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta (Aois Scoir Shainordaitheach a Chealú), 2022

debates.showAs: Parental Bereavement Leave (Amendment) Bill 2021: Referral to Select Committee
Parental Bereavement Leave (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed)
Parental Bereavement Leave (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Parental Bereavement Leave (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Parental Leave Acts 1998 and 2006 to make provision for an entitlement to bereavement leave to an employee who is a bereaved parent of a child who has died and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Shaoire do Thuismitheoirí, 1998 agus 2006 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le teideal chun saoire méala a bheith ag fostaí is tuismitheoir faoi  mhéala linbh a fuair bás, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shaoire Mhéala do Thuismitheoirí (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Workers' Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997 to prohibit the practice of designating employment as self-employment; to bring the Garda Síochána, the Defence Forces and doctors in training under the protection of the Act; to limit the race to the bottom on workers' rights by extending elements of the Act to the self-employed; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997 chun an cleachtas arb éard é fostaíocht a shainainmniú mar fhéinfhostaíocht a thoirmeasc; do thabhairt an Gharda Síochána, Óglaigh na hÉireann agus ábhar dochtúirí faoi chosaint an Achta; do chur teorainn leis an gclaonadh chun donais i dtaca le cearta oibrithe trí ghnéithe den Acht a leathnú chuig daoine féinfhostaithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Workers' Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Cearta Oibrithe agus Féinfhostaíocht Bhréagach) (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Redundancy Payments (Lay off, Short Time and Calculation of Reckonable Service) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 in respect of periods of lay off and short time and the calculation of reckonable service and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Íocaíochtaí Iomarcaíochta, 1967 maidir le tréimhsí asleagain agus gearr-ama agus maidir le seirbhís inríofa a ríomh agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Redundancy Payments (Lay off, Short Time and Calculation of Reckonable Service) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Íocaíochtaí Iomarcaíochta (Asleagan, Gearr-Am agus Seirbhís Inríofa a Ríomh), 2021

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Amendment) (Carryover of Annual Leave) (Covid-19) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997 to allow for employees to carry over untaken leave in a year where it was not reasonably practicable for an employee to take some or all of the leave to which the employee was entitled as a result of the effects of Covid-19.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997 chun a cheadú d’fhostaithe saoire a thabhairt anonn nár tógadh i mbliain i gcás nárbh indéanta le réasún d’fhostaí cuid den tsaoire nó an tsaoire go léir a thógáil a raibh an fostaí ina teideal mar gheall ar éifeachtaí Covid-19.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Amendment) (Carryover of Annual Leave) (Covid-19) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Leasú) (Saoire Bhliantúil a Thabhairt Anonn) (Covid-19), 2020

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Domestic Violence Leave) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Organisation of Working Time (Domestic Violence Leave) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a period of paid leave as a consequence of domestic violence and for that purpose to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997, to extend as a consequence the protection against unfair dismissals conferred by the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977 to 2015 and to provide for the consequential amendment of certain other enactments, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhse saoire le pá de dhroim foréigean baile agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997, do leathnú na cosanta, dá dhroim sin, ar dhífhostú éagórach a thugtar leis na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 go 2015 agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasú iarmhartach a dhéanamh ar achtacháin áirithe eile, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Domestic Violence Leave) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Saoire Foréigin Baile), 2020

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Amendment) (Right to Disconnect) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997 to establish procedures for an employee’s right to disconnect from work-related emails, texts, and calls outside of working hours, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997 d’fhonn nósanna imeachta a bhunú maidir le ceart fostaí dícheangal, lasmuigh d’uaireanta oibre, ó ríomhphoist, téacsanna agus glaonna a bhaineann leis an obair, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Amendment) (Right to Disconnect) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Leasú) (An Ceart chun Dícheangal a Dhéanamh), 2020

debates.showAs: Safety, Health and Welfare at Work (Amendment) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Safety, Health and Welfare at Work (Amendment) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 and provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair, 2005 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Safety, Health and Welfare at Work (Amendment) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair (Leasú), 2020

debates.showAs: Health (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health Act 1970 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte, 1970 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Civil Liability (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for mandatory open disclosure of a patient safety incident, to introduce a mandatory requirement that the patient be provided with any additional information which later becomes available and for that purpose to amend the Civil Liability (Amendment) Act 2017 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le nochtadh oscailte sainordaitheach ar theagmhas sábháilteachta othair, do thabhairt isteach ceanglas sainordaitheach go soláthrófaí don othar aon fhaisnéis bhreise a thiocfaidh chun bheith ar fáil tráth is déanaí ná sin agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Dhliteanas Sibhialta (Leasú), 2017 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016 [Private Members]: Referral to Select Committee
An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: An Chéad Chéim
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2), 2016
